summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Style Icon Lace Front Wigs Short Bob Wig Middle Part Wig for Women Synthetic Wig 130% Density Heat Resistant Replacement Wig (9.5 INCH, 1)
Review Date: 2019/10/21
Store: Style Icon
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '10.6 x 7.6 x 2.4 inches; 10.41 Ounces'}
Review Text: Too small..  hate it will be returning
Review Title: Nope
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Afro Kinky Straight Ponytail,Yaki Straight Wrap Around Ponytail Hairpieces Heat Resistant Synthetic Clip in Ponytail Hair Extension (1B)
Review Date: 2020/04/15
Store: Sissi's Fashion Hair
Product Description: ['Feature: * Easy to apply and ready to wear in minutes * Naturally blends into your own hair – people will not know you are wearing extensions * Glamorous new look without damaging your own hair * Provides secure yet comfortable attachment for all day wear * Reusable, Washable, Will keep style by using a little shampoo washed in cold water * Attached by a claw/crocodile clip with drawstring which will make you comfortable for all day * If you are not sure whether the hair color is match your hair, pls send your hair picture to us, we will give you some advise', 'HOW TO WASH THE HAIR EXTENSIONS', "1.Comb your hair with a brush that has soft bristles or a comb with wire pin just before you wash it.This releases any tangles.It is best not to comb from top to ends one time if the hair is a curly style. 2.Wet your hair with lukewarm water.Hot water may be more comfortable,but it deteriorates the synthetic hair fibers and shortens the extensions' lifespan.Do not attempt to brush your synthetic hair extensions when they are wet. 3.Lather the hair and extensions with a mild shampoo without a bunch of unpronounceable chemicals as ingredients.All-natural is best. 4.Rinse the shampoo out of hair extensions.Use a hair conditioner that is very oily,like a deep conditioning treatment.Rinse off 90% but leave just a little in,to prevent tangling. 5.Towel-dry your hair as best you can and then allow nature to finish the process.Do not blow dry,this will cause a lot of useless tangles that will ruin your extensions."]
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 3 inches; 5.28 Ounces'}
Review Text: It's not horrible but it's also not what I was looking for I was looking for a yaki textured ponytail which is how they described it which is false advertising and this definitely is not it's very shiny and fake looking but it was only $13 so I don't see the point in taking it back but if you're looking for yaki texture then I wouldn't get this or u will be disappointed
Review Title: Not what I was hoping
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lagunamoon Gel Base and Top Coat,Long Lasting Glossy Top Coat for Soak Off UV LED Gel Nail Polish Polygel Nail Acrylic Style Artificial False Nails,2x10 ML
Review Date: 2020/05/06
Store: Lagunamoon
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lagunamoon', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '2 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Liquid Volume': '0.33 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 1.27 Ounces'}
Review Text: Just got it yesterday love it looks beautiful looks just like pictures and it was beautifully packaged unfortunately Amazon is not allowing anyone or maybe just me to post pictures at this moment or I would..... Haven't used product yet but will give updates when I do
Review Title: Lovveeeee ❤️❤️❤️❤️
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: fani 12 Inch Long Bob Human Hair Wigs with Straight Flat Bangs None Lace Front Wigs Natural Black Real Hair for Women
Review Date: 2020/06/23
Store: fani
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'Fani', 'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 6 x 2 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: I love this hair at first I did not like it because the wig came curled at the ends and I didn't like that but I just flat ironed it and it looks just fine now, also I did not receive my free gifts but I reached out to the seller and they sent me 16 pairs of free hair clips because they were out of eyelashes so overall I'm happy with my experience.....
Review Title: Overall I'm happy!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wig Grip Band Velvet Adjustable Non Slip Wig Grip with Middle Invisible Mesh for Women Lace Wigs (Black 1PCS)
Review Date: 2020/06/24
Store: SUNiYA
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Material': 'Lace', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'SUNiYA', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Cartoon Character': 'Black', 'Package Dimensions': '8.8 x 2.3 x 0.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '824918248299'}
Review Text: finally exactly what I was looking for a black one they having brown & beige but it was really hard to find a black one like this but it's perfect and I love it it's just what I needed
Review Title: Yes finally!!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DÉBUT Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Wigs Loose Body 10A Brazilian Virgin Remy Hair Lace Parting 180% Density Natural Black (Middle Parting, 14 inches)
Review Date: 2020/07/28
Store: DÉBUT
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'DÉBUT', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '13.9 x 7.6 x 2.3 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'D&GW WH LACE ALL F MP LOOSE BODY14'}
Review Text: Very pretty hair love the wave pattern and the color came with two hair stockings and eyelashes the only reason I cannot keep it is because it's not big head friendly it is to tight and uncomfortable so unfortunately I will be having to return it
Review Title: Not BIG head friendly
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: WIGENIUS Brazilian Short Human Hair Bob Wigs 150% Density Ombre Green Cut Bob Wigs Dark Roots Straight Center Part Lace Wigs with Pre-plucked Hairline 12 inch (T1B/Green)
Review Date: 2020/12/11
Store: WIGENIUS
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.34 x 7.68 x 2.6 inches; 11.71 Ounces'}
Review Text: Absolutely beautiful!!! I tested it doing the burn test and it's definitely 100% human hair the hair color is gorgeous like a hunter green it matched my plaid green and black dress perfectly I also got the dress on Amazon the belt and my fiance's matching shirt as well we took pictures for our holiday Christmas card for this year!!! The hair is very full and thick it's very silky the softest texture human hair I've ever had I would definitely highly recommend I will be getting this wig and a different color soon!!
Review Title: Beautiful green wig!!💚💚💚
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3 Pieces Rhinestone Crystal Diamond Headband Wide Velvet Padded Hairbands Hair Party Wedding Headwear Accessories for Women Girls (Gold, Silver, Rainbow)
Review Date: 2021/04/05
Store: EBOOT
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Brand': 'EBOOT', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 9.25 x 2.09 inches; 9.98 Ounces'}
Review Text: absolutely gorgeous and sparkly they did not come damaged no Stones were missing they look like they are made really well and should hold up for a long time but we shall see but so far so good and I am very happy with this purchase!!!!!
Review Title: BEAUTIFUL!!!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

    Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a consumer with a focus on hair-related products, demonstrating a preference for various types of wigs and extensions. A consistent pattern emerges where the individual often expresses dissatisfaction with product sizing and texture, particularly regarding synthetic items which frequently received low ratings due to misrepresentation or disappointment in quality. In contrast, human hair products tended to receive higher ratings, reflecting a preference for natural aesthetics, with notable appreciation for style, comfort, and overall appearance.

Common themes highlight a desire for versatility in hairstyles, as evidenced by purchases intended for quick application and changeability. Price sensitivity is noticeable, especially in lower-priced items where the buyer expresses hesitancy in returns despite dissatisfaction, indicating a pragmatic approach to budgeting. The buyer also values quality, evidenced by a mix of high and low ratings, suggesting they are willing to invest in products that meet their expectations.

Overall, core preferences reflect a quest for stylish, versatile hair solutions with a leaning towards human hair products, strong sensitivity to quality indicators, and a cautious approach to pricing. This consumer seeks appealing aesthetics but prioritizes comfort and accurate product descriptions.

target_interaction.title: Lies
target_interaction.text: Not really sure I don't believe it's true to its description number one I really truly don't believe that is 150 density because it doesn't seem very thick and I got the wavy body wave also I don't believe this lace is transparent because I cannot see my skin through the lace it makes my scalp look very light so I'm most likely going to have to add makeup just to make it match better which is what I didn't want to have to do I was going to wear this wig as my wedding hair I'm going to see what my stylist can do with it and see if it's going to work if not I'll be sending it back
target_interaction.title_meta: 13X6 Lace Front Wig Human Hair 28 Inch Pre Plucked Bleached Knots Long Wigs For Women Malaysian Remy Hair 100% Human Hair HD Transparent Lace High Density Grade 9A Body Wave Frontal Wigs Natural Black
